captions.text: You're the only romance in my life
I like your lips when you're smiling
If you fall asleep in my arms
It is a paradise where everything stops
I will be your morning when you meet the end of dawn
I will be your stars when a sunset glows
Now and forever if you want
I'm on my way to see you
It feels new everyday on my way to you
Your voice resembles the scent of spring
You smell so good, nicer than the coffee
You hold me tight in cold winters
I'm on my way to see you
It feels new everyday on my way to you

There's no trend in your smile
 It's always the same
I feel like there's nothing I have done for you
Whatever they say, I think I'm crazy about you
I'm on my way to see you
It feels new everyday on my way to you

comments.text:
It's so great to know that Seventeen are slowly getting recognized and 
Pledis is growing bigger. Mingyu featuring in an MV, Hansol in Hello! 
Stranger and the whole Seventeen performing on different stages. Waiting 
for this year's SBS award show to watch Seventeen perform (of course with 
Orange Caramel!) If only Sam, Doyoon and MingMing were there to share the 
happiness together but Doyoon is acting, MingMing is modelling and dancing 
as usual and Sam... Just being Sam. Haha Seventeen! Hwaiting! 
Of course we shouldn't forget the song right?! This song overall is really 
great! Fighting!! 
On the other note, why is Seungcheol's stage name S.Coups?! ﻿
